ENTER_A_USERNAME_OR_EMAIL_ADDRESS: Enter a username or e-mail address
THERE_IS_NO_USER_REGISTERD_WITH_THAT_EMA: There is no user registered with that email address.
CHECK_YOUR_EMAIL_ADDRESS_FOR_NEW_PASSWOR: Check your email address for your new password.
OOPS_SOMETHING_WENT_WRONG_UPDATING_YOUR_: Oops something went wrong updaing your account.
DISABLE_USER_TO_REGISTER_NEW_ACCOUNT_FOR: Disable user to register new account from front end.
DISABLE_ADMIN_BAR_FOR_ALL_USER: Disable WordPress Admin Bar for All Users Except Admin
DISPLEY_AND_REQUIRE_USER_AGREEMENT_TO_TE: Display and require user agreement to Terms and Conditions
ENTER_TEXT_OR_A_URL_STARTING_WITH_HTTP: Enter text or a URL starting with http. If you use a URL, the Terms and Conditions text will be replaced by a link to the appropiate page.
CUSTUM_CSS_STYLES_MSG: If you want to override existing styles, or add some specific CSS rules, put them here. They will survive the updates.
TITLE: Title
SHORTCODE_HELP_MSG: OR Use [wp_user] shortcode for display login, registration, forgot password form.
LIMIT_LOGIN_ATTEMPTS_MSG: Limit rate of login attempts and block IP temporarily. It is protecting from brute force attacks.
LIMIT_LOGIN_ATTEMPTS_SETTING_MSG: Blocking access to the login page after n unsuccessful login attempts.
LOCKOUTS_MINUTES_ACCESS_WILL_BLOCKED: Minutes Lockout : Access will be blocked for
REGULAR_EXPRESSION_MSG: The regex used to validate the Password fields specified above, please do not change this unless you know what you are doing
CONTAINIG_AT_LEAST_ONE_LOWER_LETTER: containing at least one lowercase letter
AND_AT_LEAST_ONE_UPPERCASE_LETTER: and at least one uppercase letter
AND_AT_LEAST_A_SPECIAL_CHARACTER: and at least a special character (non-word characters)
VARIABLE_MSG: The variables in {CURLY BRACKETS} are used to present data and info in email. You can use them to customize your email template.
DISPLEAY_WPUSER_ADMIN_EMAIL: Displays the admin email that users can contact you at. You can configure it under Mail settings.
DISPLEAY_WPUSER_NAME: Displays the user display name or public name
DISPLEAY_WPUSER_EMAIL: Displays the E-mail address of user
THE_NAME_THAT_APPEARS_ON_MAIL_SEND: The name that appears on mails sent by
THE_ADDRESS_THAT_APPEARS_ON_MAIL_SEND: The address that appears on mails sent by
SEND_AN_EMAIL_TO_ADMIN_WHEN_USER_REGISTE: Send an e-mail to admin when user is register
SUBJECT: Subject
SEND_AN_EMAIL_TO_USER_WHEN_USER_IS_REGIS: Send an e-mail to user when user is register
SHORTCODE_FOR_LOGIN_PAGE: shortcode for display login, registration, forgot password form
SHORTCODE_FOR_POPUP: shortcode for popuup model login, registration, forgot password form
WANT_MORE_FEATURE_OR_CUSTUMIZATION: Want more feature? OR custom feature
IF_YOU_WANT_MORE_FEATURE_THEN_DROP_MAIL: If you want more feature then Drop Mail
NAME: Name
THIS_EMAIL_IS_ALREADY_USED_BY_ANOTHER_US: This email is already used by another user.  try a different one.
RECAPTCHA_MSG: Captchas are meant to protect your website from spam and abuse
RECAPTCHA_HELP_MSG_1: Sign up for an API key at
RECAPTCHA_HELP_MSG_2: Check documentation for No CAPTCHA reCAPTCHA at
